channel.title: Coin Prank
channel.description:
This is an old classic ;) but im still reposting it cos its funny.
What u need is a 2 dollar coin or a valued coin that people will pickup. Either use crazy glue or super glue, glue the coin to the ground (perferably a crouded place) and watch as people will try pick the coin up. Try not to laugh too hard or itll be too obvious and laugh ur ass off. Remember to use ALOT of glue or the person picking it up will pick it up and just mock like the idiot you are.

item.title: Coin Prank
item.dc:creator: @weirdboy123 weirdboy123
item.description:
@weirdboy123 wrote:

i fell for one of those once lol it was with a quarter i saw someone like 10 years away laughing his ass off so i stopped and kept walking lol

Read full topic

item.title: Coin Prank
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Lol, this loan place where they have pay day loans had these little folded pieces of paper that looked like a 50 dollar bill on the outside then you unfold them and they are advertisment for the pay day loan place. I used to leave those on tables at places to watch all the people grab for them and then become sad.

Read full topic

item.description:

urs too.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 17, 2006, 03:18:14 AM[/size][hr]i shouldve thought of fake paper money, the problem is will it stick lol. the thing with coins is you may lose it. so notes would be good
